name: Air Smith
description:
For Player 1:

W A S D - Player 1 Movement Keys

Spacebar - To make Player 1 shoot

For Player 2:

Arrows: Up, Left, Bottom, Right - Player 2 Movement Keys

Enter -  To make Player 2 shoot 

Addition:

You can change game options in main menu in options section (max wins interval, max live count, max rounds)
